_comment: Add a _ before an option name to comment it out and it wonâ€™t be added to the apworld
Using 'goal' as the name of an option lets you override some of the generated goal parameters
goal.description: How to end your randomized playthrough.

description: Increase the difficulty of the item pool to customize how challenging you want your playthrough to be.
When off, removes special-move items from the pool.
Set to false if you choose an objective that does not require tokens.
